body:
Oh, also, when you get to the phase where memory usage has grown again. Can
you please send SIGQUIT to the Go process and capture the entire stack
trace. That will show if goroutines are leaking.

On Wed, Nov 25, 2015 at 1:50 PM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> Thank you. We need this kind of detail to investigate any memory related
> issues.
>
> On Wed, Nov 25, 2015 at 1:46 PM, heidawei <notifications@github.com>
> wrote:
>
>> OK
>>
>> â€”
>> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
>> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/13392#issuecomment-159471210>.
>>
